name: game-storev3
description: Full-stack Game Store (Express + SQLite, React + Tailwind) with integrated dev server

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist && cp -r frontend/dist dist && (cp frontend/assites/logo.png dist/logo.png || cp frontend/assites/logo.png dist/assets/logo.png || true) && (cp frontend/assites/Invoice_Logo.png dist/invoice-header.png || cp frontend/assites/Invoice_Logo.png dist/Invoice_Logo.png || true)
